group_1.textLeft: Oh, yes. I learned firsthand...
...about that little "trick" your group has.

group_1.textRight: It sounds like we're doing something@wrong when you put it that way!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, my apologies!
Perhaps I should call it your "skill".@A strength unique to your team.
Good! I do apologize for my remark.
But you know, you did surprise me.
Kako and Ayame discovered the@Labyrinth, and we all met there...
We found the Witch, and attacked all at@once...

group_1.textRight: No kidding. It went so smoothly!

group_1.textLeft: It did, indeed.
I do have to say... The three of you put@us to shame with your teamwork.

group_1.textRight: Huh...? Aw, come on, [chara:302701:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302701:cheek_0][chara:302701:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:302701:lipSynch_1]we weren't that@good!

group_1.textLeft: You absolutely were.
Before, when you beat us to that Witch@and defeated it...
We were blocked by Familiars, so we@couldn't witness how you fought.
But this time, we saw it as clear as day.
Akira, Kako, and Meiyui were stunned@watching your team fight.
And of course...I was, as well.

group_1.textRight: Well, it's always been the three of us@doing our thing together 'til now...

group_1.textLeft: It was no wonder you were able to safely@retrieve the Grief Seed.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I'm glad everything worked out!

group_1.textLeft: To get to the point, we were all@incredibly impressed by your work.
Especially me...
That little "trick" you have...

group_1.textRight: Hang on, now! Enough with calling it that!

group_1.textLeft: No, I think it's the right word.
You have a "trick" to your methods.
